div.pre: 1374 Samsun (anc. Amisus), Pontus, c. (907) 1900 Burial: c. 150 B.C. (M) Contents: 3+ AR Mithradates IV and Laodice: 3 tetradr. Disposition: Paris 1; Jameson 1 (Cat. 1365); Naville Apr. 4, 1921, 2092 Reinach, RN 1902, p. 52, illus. According to information from Regling other Hellenistic tetradr. were found with these three coins
